message.name: ERR_CASEAPPEALASSISTANT_FV_EXPECTED_END_DATE
message.locale: An expected end date is mandatory for case appeals.

message.name: ERR_CASEAPPEALASSISTANT_XFV_STARTDATE_CASESTART
message.locale: The Case Appeal start date must not be earlier than case start date (%1d).

message.name: ERR_CASEAPPEALASSISTANT_FV_NO_SERVICE_SUPPLIER
message.locale: A service supplier must be selected for this Case Appeal

message.name: ERR_CASEAPPEALASSISTANT_XFV_STARTDATE_ECD
message.locale: Appeal start date cannot be greater than the expected completion date.

message.name: ERR_CASEAPPEALASSISTANT_XFV_STARTDATE_ENDDATE
message.locale: Appeal start date cannot be greater than end date.

message.name: INF_CASEAPPEALASSISTANT_ENDDATE_OUTCOME
message.locale: An Appeal end date has been recorded, therefore you must enter an outcome.

message.name: INF_CASEAPPEALASSISTANT_REASON
message.locale: A case appeal has been recorded for case %1s by %2s.

message.name: INF_CASEAPPEALASSISTANT_RECORDED
message.locale: A case appeal has been recorded for case %1s of type %2s for %3s.

message.name: INF_CASEAPPEALASSISTANTOUTCOME_ENDDATE
message.locale: An outcome has been recorded, therefore you must enter the appeal end date.

message.name: INF_CASEAPPEALASSISTANTOUTCOME_REASON
message.locale: An outcome of "%1s" has been recorded for appeal on case "%2s" by "%3s".

message.name: INF_CASEAPPEALASSISTANTOUTCOME_RECORDED
message.locale: Outcome to appeal on case %1s of type %2s for %3s has been recorded.
